item.description: Resume TeX Resume as of second semester of freshman year. Packages dependencies: enumitem, geometry, graphbox, hyperref Todo: * Other than gettings resume-worthy experience, * Declutter Education section * Use true \section*()s, rather than brute forced text headings * Fix Relevant Courses overfull \hbox size guessing * Make true adjustable parameters for sizes and number of items for scalability
